      var period = days_to_store * 60 * 60 * 24 * 1000;   // in seconds
      var expiresDate = new Date((period) + +new Date);
      var cookieString = cookie_name + '=' + param + '; path=/; expires=' + expiresDate.toGMTString();
      document.cookie = cookieString;
      document.cookie = cookieString + '; domain=.' + location.host;
  };

  // writing value to cookie
  setAdmitadCookie(uid_channel_name, uid_cookie_name);
</script>

<script>
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    setTimeout(() => {
      if (!document.querySelector('fw-live-helper')) {
        var n = document.createElement('fw-live-helper')
        document.body.appendChild(n)
      }
    }, 0)
  })

  // For when DOMContentLoaded event didn't fire on page due to lots of JS
  const intervalId = setInterval(() => {
    if (!document.querySelector('fw-live-helper')) {
      var n = document.createElement('fw-live-helper')
      document.body.appendChild(n)
    } else {
      clearInterval(intervalId)
    }
  }, 500)
</script>

<script defer>
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    function isIE() {
      const ua = window.navigator.userAgent;
      const msie = ua.indexOf('MSIE ');
      const trident = ua.indexOf('Trident/');

      return (msie > 0 || trident > 0);
    }

    if (!isIE()) return;
    const cartSubmitInput = document.createElement('input');
    cartSubmitInput.setAttribute('name', 'checkout');
    cartSubmitInput.setAttribute('type', 'hidden');
    document.querySelector('#cart').appendChild(cartSubmitInput);
    document.querySelector('#checkout').addEventListener('click', function(event) {
      document.querySelector('#cart').submit();
    });
  });
</script>

    <style>
        .header-main {background: #fff;z-index: 1;}
        header .header-after-sales {left: 0;right: 0;bottom: 0;background: #F2F2F2;height: 34px;transition: all .15s;opacity: 0;position: absolute;z-index: -1;}
        header .header-after-sales.show {bottom: -34px;opacity: 1;z-index: 0}
        .after-sales-item {display: flex;align-items: center;cursor: pointer;}
        .header-after-sales .after-sales-item img {width: 28px;height: 28px;object-fit: contain;margin-right: 8px;}
        .after-sales-item span {font-size: 12px;color: #333;transition: color .25s;max-width: 210px;}
        .after-sales-item:hover span {color: #ff5000;}

        @media screen and (max-width: 1024px) {
            .after-sales-item {justify-content: center;}
            .after-sales-container .swiper-wrapper {justify-content: unset;column-gap: unset;max-width: unset;}
            .after-sales-container .swiper-wrapper .swiper-slide {max-width: unset;display: flex;justify-content: center;align-items: center;}
        }

        @media screen and (min-width: 1024px) {
            .after-sales-container .swiper-wrapper {justify-content: center;column-gap: 40px;max-width: 69.27vw;margin: 0 auto;}
            .after-sales-container .swiper-slide {display: flex;width: max-content;}
        }
        
        .after-sales__private_modal.modal {align-items: flex-start!important;padding-top: 100px;}
        .after-sales__private_modal.modal-container.modal .moadal-header {padding: 16px 32px;height: auto}
        .after-sales__private_modal.modal-container.modal .moadal-header-content {text-align: left;}
        .after-sales__private_modal .modal-content {border-radius: 10px;max-width: 800px;width: 800px;}
        .after-sales-item__content {color: #666;overflow: hidden;}
        @media screen and (max-width: 1024px) {
            .after-sales__private_modal.modal {padding-top: 20vw;}
            .after-sales__private_modal.modal-container.modal .moadal-header {padding: 6px 18px;min-height: 52px;height: auto;}
            .after-sales__private_modal.modal-container.modal .modal-content {max-width: 85vw;width: 85vw;padding: 0;overflow: hidden;}
            .after-sales__private_modal..modal-container.modal .modal-content-body {max-height: 60vh;overflow-y: scroll;}

    <script defer>
        class AfterSales {
            constructor(e) {
                this.DOM = e.el;
                if (!document.querySelector(this.DOM)) return
                this.swiper = null;
                this.init()
            }

            init() {
                this.checkViewport();
                let this_ = this
                window.addEventListener('resize', function () {
                    this_.checkViewport();
                });

                window.addEventListener('scroll', function () {
                    const target = document.querySelector(".header-after-sales")
                    if(!target) return
                    const scrollTop = document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop;
                    if(scrollTop > 500) {
                        target.classList.add("show");
                        if(document.querySelector("jky-header")) {
                            const _h = document.querySelector("jky-header").getBoundingClientRect().height
                            let _h_num = _h + 34;
                            document.querySelector("body").style.setProperty(
                            '--jky-header-h',
                            `${Math.floor(_h_num)}px`
                            );
                        }
                        if(document.querySelector(".after-sales-container").getAttribute("data-load") !== "loaded") {
                            this_.loadImg()
                        }
                    } else {
                        target.classList.remove("show");
                        if(document.querySelector("jky-header") && document.querySelector("body").style.getPropertyValue('--jky-header-h')) {
                            const _h = Math.floor(document.querySelector("jky-header").getBoundingClientRect().height)
                            const _jky_h = Number(document.querySelector("body").style.getPropertyValue('--jky-header-h').replace('px', ''))
                            if(_jky_h > _h) {
                                let _h_num = _jky_h - 34;
                                _h_num > 0 && document.querySelector("body").style.setProperty(
                                '--jky-header-h',
                                `${Math.floor(_h_num)}px`
                                );
                            }
                        }
                    }
                });

                $(".header-after-sales .after-sales-item").click(function(e) {
                   ZModle.getInstance(`<div class="after-sales-item__content jky-text-base">${$(this).attr('data-content')}</div>`, {
                     id: `after-sales-item__${$(this).attr('data-index')}`,
                     header: $(this).text() || '',
                     class: "after-sales__private_modal"
                   })
                })
            }

            initSwiper() {
                this.swiper = new Swiper(this.DOM, {
                    autoplay: {
                        delay: 4000
                    },
                    loop: true
                });
            }

            destroySwiper() {
                if (this.swiper) {
                    this.swiper.destroy();
                    this.swiper = null;
                }
            }

            checkViewport() {
                if (window.innerWidth < 1024) {
                    if (!this.swiper) {
                        this.initSwiper();
                    }
                } else {
                    if (this.swiper) {
                        this.destroySwiper();
                    }
                }
            }

            loadImg() {
                const $el = document.querySelectorAll(".after-sales-container img.lazyimg")
                $el.forEach(item => {
                    const src = item.getAttribute("data-src")
                    if(src && !item.classList.contains("loaded")) {
                        item.setAttribute("src", src)
                        item.classList.add("loaded")
                    }
                })
                document.querySelector(".after-sales-container").setAttribute("data-load", "loaded")
            }
        }

        $(document).ready(function() {
            new AfterSales({
                el: '.after-sales-container'
            })
        })
    </script>

  .pswp .pswp__bg {

  .pswp__thumbs .swiper-slide {
    border-radius: 2px;
    overflow: hidden;
    border: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, .15);
    opacity: .8;
    transition: border .3s, opacity .3s;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    width: 32px;
    height: 32px;
  }

              camera-controls="true" 
              style="--poster-color: transparent;"

              data-js-focus-visible="" 
              ar-status="not-presenting" 
              class="" 
              tabindex="0"

</product-gllerry><link href="//www.jackery.com/cdn/shop/t/315/assets/photoswipe.css?v=122136442904495767851709207227" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" media="all" /><script defer>
  if (!customElements.get('product-gllerry')) {
    customElements.define('product-gllerry', class productGllerry extends HTMLElement {
      constructor() {
        super()
        this.product_gllery = null
        this.gllerry_thumb = null

        this.selectors = {
          gllery_conrainer: this.querySelector(".product-media__box .swiper"),
          gllery_prev: this.querySelector(".product-media__box .swiper .swiper-button-prev"),
          gllery_next: this.querySelector(".product-media__box .swiper .swiper-button-next"),
          gllerry_thumb: this.querySelector(".product-image-thumbs .swiper"),
          play_video_btn: this.querySelector(".product_gallery-tab-bar .product_gallery-tab_item[data-type=video]"),

          media_image_main: this.querySelector(".product-media-container__inner .product_gallery-imagebox"),
          media_video_main: this.querySelector(".product-media-container__inner .product_gallery-videobox"),
          media_model_main: this.querySelector(".product-media-container__inner .product_gallery-modelbox"),
        }

        this.tabs = this.querySelectorAll('.product_gallery-tab_item')
        this.slider = this.querySelector('.product--list-tabs_slider')

        // 3D model 数量
        
          this.modelSize = '1'
        

        this.isThumbClick = false;

        this.init()
      }
      init() {
        const that = this
        this.gllerry_thumb = new Swiper(this.selectors.gllerry_thumb, {
          spaceBetween: document.documentElement.clientWidth < 1024 ? 4 : 12,
          slidesPerView: 10,
          freeMode: true,
          watchSlidesProgress: true,
          on: {
            click: function() {
              that.isThumbClick = true; // 设置标志变量
            }
          }
        })

        this.product_gllery = new Swiper(this.selectors.gllery_conrainer, {
            spaceBetween: 12,
            // lazy: {
            //     loadPrevNext: true
            // },
            // observer: true,
            // loop: true,
            navigation: {
              nextEl: this.selectors.gllery_next,
              prevEl: this.selectors.gllery_prev,
            },
            thumbs: {
              swiper: this.gllerry_thumb
            },
            on: {
              slideChangeTransitionEnd: function(swiper) {
                // 获取主图 Swiper 的真实索引
                const realIndex = swiper.realIndex
                that.realIndex = realIndex
                // 手动更新缩略图的位置。缩略图一行最多显示 10 个
                if (realIndex > 9) {
                  that.gllerry_thumb.slideTo(realIndex)
                }

                const currentIndex = swiper.activeIndex;
                const previousIndex = swiper.previousIndex;

                if (that.isThumbClick) {
                  // 数据埋码
                  that.GAEvent({
                    "product_spu_name": "Jackery Solar Generator 2000 v2", //识别页面产品spu标题名称text
                    "module": "Product Image", //固定模块名称Product Image
                    "position": "Picture", //点击图片类型或者 只有图片类型，固定命名为Picture
                    "rank": realIndex + 1, // 缩略图从左到右的序号，1，2，3...,
                    "button_name": "picture", // 点击的形式：左点击left，右点击right，直接点击缩略图 picture
                  })
                } else {
                  // 数据埋码
                  that.GAEvent({
                    "product_spu_name": "Jackery Solar Generator 2000 v2", //识别页面产品spu标题名称text
                    "module": "Product Image", //固定模块名称Product Image
                    "position": "Picture", //点击图片类型或者 只有图片类型，固定命名为Picture
                    "rank": realIndex + 1, // 缩略图从左到右的序号，1，2，3...,
                    "button_name": currentIndex > previousIndex ? "right" : "left", // 点击的形式：左点击left，右点击right，直接点击缩略图 picture
                  })
                }

                that.isThumbClick = false
              },
            }
        })

        this.tabs.forEach(tab => {
          tab.addEventListener('click', () => {
            if(tab.classList.contains("active")) return

            this.tabs.forEach(t => t.classList.remove('active'))
            tab.classList.add('active')
            this.setSliderPosition(this.slider, tab)

            if (tab.dataset.type === 'video') {
              // 隐藏 图片缩略图
              $(".product-image-thumbs").css('display', `none`)
              // 隐藏 3D 切换
              if (this.querySelector('.product_gallery-3d-tab')) {
                this.querySelector('.product_gallery-3d-tab').style.display = 'none'
              }

              this.selectors.media_image_main && (this.selectors.media_image_main.style.display = 'none')
              this.selectors.media_video_main && (this.selectors.media_video_main.style.display = 'block')
              if (this.selectors.media_model_main) {
                this.selectors.media_model_main.classList.remove('active')
                this.selectors.media_model_main.style.display = 'none'
              }
              
              this.playVideo()

              this.product_gllery.allowTouchMove = false

              // 数据埋码
              this.GAEvent({
                "product_spu_name": 'Jackery Solar Generator 2000 v2', //识别页面产品spu标题名称text
                "module": "Product Image", //固定模块名称
                "position": "Video", //固定命名为Video
                "link": this.selectors.media_video_main.getAttribute('video-src'), // 视频本身链接
              })
            }
            else if (tab.dataset.type === 'model') {
              // 隐藏 图片缩略图
              $(".product-image-thumbs").css('display', `none`)
              // 显示 3D 切换
              if (this.querySelector('.product_gallery-3d-tab')) {
                this.querySelector('.product_gallery-3d-tab').style.display = 'flex'
              }

              this.selectors.media_image_main && (this.selectors.media_image_main.style.display = 'none')
              this.selectors.media_video_main && (this.selectors.media_video_main.style.display = 'none')
              if (this.selectors.media_model_main) {
                this.selectors.media_model_main.classList.add('active')
                this.selectors.media_model_main.style.display = 'block'
              }

              if(this.querySelector("product-model")) { // 3d model
                try {
                  // 数量大于1个，并且 3D 切换DOM显示
                  if (this.modelSize > 1 && this.querySelector('.product_gallery-3d-tab')) {
                    // 默认都不显示
                    this.querySelector('product-model[data-index="1"]').style.display = 'none';
                    this.querySelector('product-model[data-index="2"]').style.display = 'none';

                    // 显示并加载当前active
                    const index = this.querySelector('.product_gallery-3d-tab_item.active').dataset.index
                    const targetProductModel = this.querySelector(`product-model[data-index="${index}"]`)
                    targetProductModel.style.display = 'block'
                    targetProductModel.loadContent(targetProductModel.dataset.url, targetProductModel.dataset.previewImage)

                    // 初始化设置 3D切换 高亮下划线位置
                    this.setSliderPosition(this.querySelector('.product_gallery-3d-tab_highlight'), this.querySelector('.product_gallery-3d-tab_item.active'))
                  } else {
                    // 只有1个，loadContent()会默认加载，不用传参
                    this.querySelector('product-model').style.display = 'block';
                    this.querySelector("product-model").loadContent();
                  }
                  
                  this.product_gllery.allowTouchMove = false
                } catch (error) {
                  console.info("not init 3d model script");
                }
              } else {
                this.product_gllery.allowTouchMove = true
              }

              this.hideVideo()

              // 数据埋码
              this.GAEvent({
                "product_spu_name": "Jackery Solar Generator 2000 v2", //识别页面产品spu标题名称text
                "module": "Product Image", //固定模块名称Product Image
                "position": "3D", //点击类型，图片 固定命名为Picture；3D 固定命名为 3D 
              })
            }
            else {
              // 显示 图片缩略图
              $(".product-image-thumbs").css('display', `block`)
              // 隐藏 3D 切换
              if (this.querySelector('.product_gallery-3d-tab')) {
                this.querySelector('.product_gallery-3d-tab').style.display = 'none'
              }

              this.selectors.media_image_main && (this.selectors.media_image_main.style.display = 'block')
              this.selectors.media_video_main && (this.selectors.media_video_main.style.display = 'none')
              if (this.selectors.media_model_main) {
                this.selectors.media_model_main.classList.remove('active')
                this.selectors.media_model_main.style.display = 'none'
              }

              this.hideVideo()

              this.product_gllery.allowTouchMove = true

              // 数据埋码
              this.GAEvent({
                "product_spu_name": "Jackery Solar Generator 2000 v2", //识别页面产品spu标题名称text
                "module": "Product Image", //固定模块名称Product Image
                "position": "Picture", //点击类型，图片 固定命名为Picture；3D 固定命名为 3D 
              })
            }
          })
        })

        // 3D 模型切换
        this.querySelectorAll('.product_gallery-3d-tab_item').forEach(tab => {
          tab.addEventListener('click', () => {
            if(tab.classList.contains("active")) return

            this.querySelectorAll('.product_gallery-3d-tab_item').forEach(t => t.classList.remove('active'))
            tab.classList.add('active')
            this.setSliderPosition(this.querySelector('.product_gallery-3d-tab_highlight'), tab)

            const index = tab.dataset.index
            const targetProductModel = this.querySelector(`product-model[data-index="${index}"]`)
            targetProductModel.style.display = 'block'
            targetProductModel.loadContent(targetProductModel.dataset.url, targetProductModel.dataset.previewImage)

            if (index === '1') {
              this.querySelector('product-model[data-index="2"]').style.display = 'none'
            } else {
              this.querySelector('product-model[data-index="1"]').style.display = 'none'
            }
          })
        })

        // 初始化设置 图片、视频、3D切换 高亮背景位置
        this.setSliderPosition(this.slider, this.querySelector('.product_gallery-tab_item.active'))
      }
      // 设置 高亮背景
      setSliderPosition(slider, tab) {
        slider.style.width = `${tab.offsetWidth}px`
        slider.style.left = `${tab.offsetLeft}px`
      }
      hideVideo() {
        if(this.selectors.media_video_main) {
          this.selectors.media_video_main.classList.remove("active")
          if(!this.selectors.media_video_main.pause) return
          this.selectors.media_video_main.pause()
        }
      }
      playVideo() {
        if(this.selectors.media_video_main) {
          this.selectors.media_video_main.classList.add("active")
          if(!this.selectors.media_video_main.jsPlay) return
          this.selectors.media_video_main.jsPlay()
        }
      }
      // 数据埋码
      GAEvent(params) {
        if (window.dataLayer || Array.isArray(window.dataLayer)) {
          window.dataLayer.push({ "event_parameters": null });
          window.dataLayer.push({
            "event":"ga4Event",
            "event_name":"products_details_page_user_clicks",
            "event_parameters":{
              "current_page": window.location.href, // current page url
              ...params
            }
          });
        }
      }
    })
  }
</script>

<script type="module" defer>
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
    import(/* webpackChunkName: "photoswipe-lightbox" */ '//www.jackery.com/cdn/shop/t/315/assets/photoswipelightbox.js?v=102964870355885350271709207228').then((module) => {
      const PhotoSwipeLightbox = module.default;

      // get() 将类型转为 原生数组
      // const galleryChildren = $('.product-media__box .product_gallery-imagebox .swiper-wrapper').children('a').not(':first-child, :last-child').get()
      const galleryChildren = $('.product-media__box .product_gallery-imagebox .swiper-wrapper').children('a').get()
      const options = {
        gallery: ".product-media__box",
        children: galleryChildren,
        pswpModule: () => import('//www.jackery.com/cdn/shop/t/315/assets/photoswipe.js?v=1492075765364147731724923807'),
        
        wheelToZoom: true,
        zoom: false,
        padding: {
          top: 32, bottom: 184, left: 0, right: 0
        },
        counter: false,
        bgOpacity: 1,
        arrowNextSVG: `<div class="swiper-button-next swiper--pagebtn" tabindex="0" role="button" aria-label="Next slide"></div>`,
        arrowPrevSVG: `<div class="swiper-button-prev swiper--pagebtn" tabindex="0" role="button" aria-label="Previous slide"></div>`,
        closeSVG: `<span class="close pswp--close">×</span>`
      };

      const lightbox = new PhotoSwipeLightbox(options);

      // 是否是点击 预览缩略图
      let isClickThumb = false
      let isScale = false

      const pos_parant = (element, parent) => {
        var elementRect = element.getBoundingClientRect();
        var elementLeft = elementRect.left;

        var parentRect = parent.getBoundingClientRect();
        var parentLeft = parentRect.left;
        var parentWidth = parentRect.width;

        var relativePosition = {
            left: elementLeft - parentLeft,
            right: parentLeft + parentWidth - elementLeft
        };

        return relativePosition
      }

      const isMobile = () => document.documentElement.clientWidth < 1024;

      // 监听 beforeOpen 事件
      lightbox.on('beforeOpen', () => {
        isScale = true
      });
    
      lightbox.on("uiRegister", function () {
        lightbox.pswp.ui.registerElement({
          name: 'bulletsIndicator',
          className: 'pswp__bullets-indicator',

          appendTo: "wrapper",
          onInit: (el, pswp) => {
            let maxScrollDistance = 0
            let pre_index = 0
            const thumbs = document.querySelector(".product-image-thumbs .swiper")
            let bullet = document.createElement("div");
            let bullet_wrapper = document.createElement("div");
            bullet.className = "pswp__thumbs swiper";
            bullet_wrapper.className = "swiper-wrapper";

            const imgLength = '10'
            if (imgLength < 8 && isMobile()) {
              bullet_wrapper.className += " justify-center"
            }

            thumbs.querySelectorAll(".swiper-slide[data-media=image]").forEach(item => {
              const img = item.querySelector("img")
              const clone_img_node = img.cloneNode(true)
              let slide_wrapper = document.createElement("div");
              slide_wrapper.className = "swiper-slide";

              slide_wrapper.appendChild(clone_img_node)
              bullet_wrapper.appendChild(slide_wrapper)
            })
            bullet.appendChild(bullet_wrapper)

            el.appendChild(bullet);

            pswp.on("bindEvents", () => {
              $(".pswp__thumbs.swiper .swiper-slide").click(function() {

                if($(this).hasClass("active")) return

                isClickThumb = true

                pswp.goTo($(this).index())

                pos_parant($(this)[0], $(".pswp__thumbs .swiper-wrapper")[0])

                GAEvent({
                  "product_spu_name": "Jackery Solar Generator 2000 v2", //识别页面产品spu标题名称text
                  "module": "Product Image", //固定模块名称Product Image
                  "position": "Picture", //点击图片类型或者 只有图片类型，固定命名为Picture
                  "rank": pswp.currSlide.index + 1, // 缩略图从左到右的序号，1，2，3...,
                  "button_name": "picture", // 点击的形式：左点击left，右点击right，直接点击缩略图 picture
                })
              })
            }) 

            pswp.on("change", (e) => {
              if(!document.querySelectorAll(".pswp__thumbs")) return

              $(".pswp__thumbs.swiper .swiper-slide").removeClass("active")
              $(".pswp__thumbs.swiper .swiper-slide")[pswp.currSlide.index].classList.add("active")

              const current_dis = $(".pswp__thumbs .swiper-wrapper").scrollLeft()
              const pos_info = pos_parant($(".pswp__thumbs.swiper .swiper-slide")[pswp.currSlide.index], $(".pswp__thumbs .swiper-wrapper")[0])
              const slide_w = $(".pswp__thumbs .swiper-wrapper .swiper-slide").width()
              const visible_w = $(".pswp__thumbs .swiper-wrapper").width()
              
              let next = pswp.currSlide.index > pre_index
              if(pos_info.right < slide_w && next) { // right
                $(".pswp__thumbs .swiper-wrapper").scrollLeft(current_dis + (12 + slide_w) * (pswp.currSlide.index - pre_index))
              }

              if(pos_info.left < 0 && !next) { // left
                $(".pswp__thumbs .swiper-wrapper").scrollLeft(current_dis - (12 + slide_w) * (pre_index - pswp.currSlide.index))
              }

              if (!isClickThumb && !isScale) {
                // 数据埋码
                GAEvent({
                  "product_spu_name": "Jackery Solar Generator 2000 v2", //识别页面产品spu标题名称text
                  "module": "Product Image", //固定模块名称Product Image
                  "position": "Picture", //点击图片类型或者 只有图片类型，固定命名为Picture
                  "rank": pswp.currSlide.index + 1, // 缩略图从左到右的序号，1，2，3...,
                  "button_name": next ? "right" : "left", // 点击的形式：左点击left，右点击right，直接点击缩略图 picture
                })
              }
              
              pre_index = pswp.currSlide.index
              isClickThumb = false
              isScale = false
            })
          },
        });
      });

      lightbox.init();

      // 数据埋码
      function GAEvent(params) {
        window.dataLayer.push({ "event_parameters": null });
        window.dataLayer.push({
          "event":"ga4Event",
          "event_name":"products_details_page_user_clicks",
          "event_parameters":{
            "current_page": window.location.href, // current page url
            ...params
          }
        });
      }
    })
  })
</script>

<script>
	document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
		let countryCode = `${Shopify.country}`;

		// Demo US店铺 Code设置
		

		let productStructuredData = {
			"@context": "https://schema.org/",
			"@type": "Product",
			"url": "https://www.jackery.com/products/jackery-solar-generator-2000-v2",
			"name": "Jackery Solar Generator 2000 v2",
			"image": "https://www.jackery.com/cdn/shop/files/solar-generator-2000-v2-series-7792637.png?v=1754016785",
			"description": `
2042Wh capacity and 2200W output, powering over 1 day of emergency needs.
The smallest, lightest home backup power: 40% smaller, 34% lighter at just 17.9kg.
1.7-hour Emergency Super Charge.
Jackery’s exclusive CTB technology maximizes both space efficiency and safety through its compact honeycomb design.
Quiet, eco-friendly energy with next-gen LiFePO4 battery lasting over 10 years.
ChargeShield 2.0 for advanced protection and efficient charging.
UPS ≤20ms for seamless power backup for computers, network devices, refrigerators, lighting, microwaves, and more.
Smart App Control for easy management and monitoring.


3-year warranty + 2-year extended warranty （applied automatically if purchased from our official website）

`,
			"brand": {
				"@type": "Brand",
				"name": "Jackery"
			},
			"sku": "60-2020-USD1D2",
			"offers": {
				"@type": "Offer",
				"price": "2499",
				"priceCurrency": "USD",
				"availability": "https://schema.org/InStock",
				"itemCondition": "https://schema.org/NewCondition",
				"url": "https://www.jackery.com/products/jackery-solar-generator-2000-v2",
				"hasMerchantReturnPolicy": {
					"@type": "MerchantReturnPolicy",
					"applicableCountry": `${countryCode}`,
					"returnPolicyCategory": "https://schema.org/MerchantReturnFiniteReturnWindow",
					"merchantReturnDays": 30,
					"returnFees": "https://schema.org/FreeReturn",
					"returnMethod": "https://schema.org/ReturnByMail"
				},
				"shippingDetails": [
					{
						"@type": "OfferShippingDetails",
						"deliveryTime": {
							"@type": "ShippingDeliveryTime",
							
							"handlingTime": {
								"@type": "QuantitativeValue",
								"minValue": "0",
								"maxValue": "1",
								"unitCode": "DAY"
							},
							
							
							"transitTime": {
								"@type": "QuantitativeValue",
								"minValue": "2",
								"maxValue": "5",
								"unitCode": "DAY"
							}
							
						},
						"shippingDestination": {
							"@type": "DefinedRegion",
							"addressCountry": `${countryCode}`
						},
						"shippingRate": {
							"@type": "MonetaryAmount",
							
							
							"value": 0,
							
							"currency": "USD"
						}
					},
					// 英国 - 北爱尔兰
					
				]
			}
		}


		// 启用judge.me插件后，且评论有数据时，才展示对应结构化数据
		let pdpReviewBadge = document.querySelector('.jdgm-prev-badge');
		if (pdpReviewBadge && pdpReviewBadge.getAttribute('data-number-of-reviews') != 0) {
			let productReviewData = {
				"@type": "AggregateRating",
				"ratingValue": pdpReviewBadge.getAttribute('data-average-rating'),
				"reviewCount": pdpReviewBadge.getAttribute('data-number-of-reviews')
			}
			productStructuredData.aggregateRating = productReviewData;

			let reviewsArr = [];
			document.querySelectorAll('.jdgm-rev').forEach(function (item) {
				let score = item.querySelector('.jdgm-rev__rating').getAttribute('data-score');
				let author = item.querySelector('.jdgm-rev__author').innerText;
				let datetime = item.querySelector('.jdgm-rev__timestamp').getAttribute('data-content');
				let title = item.querySelector('.jdgm-rev__title').innerText;
				let content = item.querySelector('.jdgm-rev__body').innerText;
				let currData = {
					"@type": "Review",
					"author": {
						"@type": "Person",
						"name": author
					},
					"datePublished": datetime,
					"reviewBody": content,
					"name": title,
					"reviewRating": {
						"@type": "Rating",
						"bestRating": "5",
						"ratingValue": score,
						"worstRating": "1"
					}
				}
				reviewsArr.push(currData);
			});
			productStructuredData.review = reviewsArr;
		}

		// 生成产品结构化数据的script标签
		let productStructuredDataScript = document.createElement('script');
		productStructuredDataScript.type = 'application/ld+json';
		productStructuredDataScript.textContent = JSON.stringify(productStructuredData, null, 2);
		document.head.appendChild(productStructuredDataScript);
	})
</script>

    background: linear-gradient(267deg, #000000 61%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 100%);
    }
    .product-tabs-box.inverted jky-tabs .jky-tabs-scroll svg path {
    fill: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
    }

<script>
    $(document).ready(function() {
        const tabs_is_mobile = window.innerWidth < 1024;
        const type_column = "slide" === "column"

        if(!tabs_is_mobile) {
            if(!location.hash) {
                $(`.produc-detail--contetn_item:eq(0)`).height('max-content')
                $(`.produc-detail--contetn_item:not(:eq(0))`).height('0px')
            }

            function setTabsUnderline() {
                const tabs_under = $(".subnav-list .slider-main")
                const active_tab = $(".subnav-list .navli.active")
                if (!tabs_under.length || !active_tab.length) return

                tabs_under.width(`${active_tab.width()}px`)
                tabs_under.css("left", `${active_tab.position().left}px`)
            }
            setTabsUnderline()
            $(".subnav-list .navli").click(function () {
                $(".subnav-list .navli").removeClass("active")
                $(this).addClass("active")
                setTabsUnderline()

                const index = $(this).index()

                if(!type_column) {
                    $(`.produc-detail--contetn_item:eq(${index})`).height('max-content')
                    $(`.produc-detail--contetn_item:not(:eq(${index}))`).height('0px')
                    $(".produc-detail--content .inner--container").css('--translate-active', index);

                    const scrollTop = $(".produc-detail--contetn_item").offset().top - $(".product-tabs-container").height()
                    $('html, body').animate({ scrollTop, }, 10);
                } else {
                    const contents = document.querySelectorAll(".inner--container_column .produc-detail--contetn_item")
                    const _content = contents[index]
                    if(!_content) return

                    const rect = _content.getBoundingClientRect()
                    const needNavHeight = $(".product-tabs-container").height()
                    const scrollY = rect.top + window.scrollY - needNavHeight
                    $('html, body').animate({ scrollTop: scrollY, }, 200);
                }

                invertNavigation()

                const cate = $(this).attr("data-cate")
                history.pushState(null, null, `#${cate}`);
            })
            
            function handleHash() {
                const hash = location.hash.replace("#", "");
                let target = ''
                if(!location.hash || hash.indexOf("product_tab_") === -1) {
                    target = null
                } else {
                    target = hash
                }
                target && $(`.product-tabs-container .navli[data-cate=${target}]`).trigger('click');
            }
            setTimeout(() => handleHash(), 200)

            document.addEventListener('variantChangeEvent', (e) => {
                if(e.detail && e.detail.variant) {
                    $(".product-detail-variants .product-tabs-container .product-name").text(e.detail.variant.option1)
                    $('.product-detail-variants .product-tabs-container .subnav-list .navli').attr('data-ga-params-content', e.detail.variant.option1)
                }
            });
        }

        if (!customElements.get('jky-tabs') && tabs_is_mobile) {
            customElements.define('jky-tabs', class JkyTabs extends HTMLElement {
                constructor() {
                    super();
                    this.selectors = {
                        container: this.querySelector(".jky-tabs-scroll-inner"),
                        next: this.querySelector(".next-action"),
                        next_btn: this.querySelector(".next-action"),
                        prev: this.querySelector(".prev-action"),
                        prev_btn: this.querySelector(".prev-action")
                    }
                    this.isProdctTab = !$(this).attr("data-type")
                    this.dragging = false
                    this.curYPos = 0
                    this.curXPos = 0
                    this.isMobile = window.innerWidth < 1024;
                    this.onmousedown_event = this.isMobile ? 'ontouchstart' : 'onmousedown'
                    this.onmouseup_event = this.isMobile ? 'touchend' : 'onmouseup'
                    this.onmousemove_event = this.isMobile ? 'touchmove' : 'mousemove'
                    this.init()
                    this.scrolling = false
                }

                init() {
                    this.move()
                    this.setTabsUnderline()

                    let this_ = this

                    this.querySelectorAll(".jky-tabs-item").forEach(item => {
                        item.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
                            // 区分拖拽和点击操作
                            if(this.endtime - this.startime < 300 || !e.pointerType) {
                                $(this).find(".jky-tabs-item").removeClass("curr_tab")
                                $(this).find(".jky-tabs-item").removeClass("active")
                                item.classList.add("active", "curr_tab")
                                this.setTabsUnderline()

                                const index = $(item).index()
                                if(index === this.querySelectorAll(".jky-tabs-item").length - 1) {
                                    this.selectors.next.classList.add("unvisible")
                                    this.selectors.prev.classList.remove("unvisible")
                                }

                                if(index === 0) {
                                    this.selectors.prev.classList.add("unvisible")
                                    this.selectors.next.classList.remove("unvisible")
                                }

                                if(this_.isProdctTab) {
                                    this_.slideToVisiable($(item)[0])
                                    invertNavigation()

                                    if(!type_column) {
                                        $(".produc-detail--content .inner--container").css('--translate-active', index);
                                        $(`.produc-detail--contetn_item:eq(${index})`).height('max-content')
                                        $(`.produc-detail--contetn_item:not(:eq(${index}))`).height('0px')
                                        const scrollTop = $(".produc-detail--contetn_item").offset().top - $(".product-tabs-container").height()
                                        $('html, body').animate({ scrollTop, }, 10);
                                    } else {
                                        const contents = document.querySelectorAll(".inner--container_column .produc-detail--contetn_item")

                                        const _content = contents[index]
                                        if(!_content || this_.scrolling) return
                                        this_.scrolling = true
                                        const rect = _content.getBoundingClientRect()
                                        const needNavHeight = $(".product-tabs-container").height()
                                        const scrollY = rect.top + window.scrollY - needNavHeight + 50
                                        console.log("yyyyyyyyyy", scrollY)
                                        $('html, body').animate({ scrollTop: scrollY, }, 200);
                                        setTimeout(() => { this_.scrolling = false }, 250)
                                    }

                                    const cate = $(item).attr("data-cate")
                                    history.pushState(null, null, `#${cate}`);
                                }
                            }
                        })
                    })

                    this.selectors.next_btn.addEventListener("click", () => {
                        const active_tab = this.querySelector(".jky-tabs-item.curr_tab")
                        const next_tab = $(active_tab).next(".jky-tabs-item")[0]

                        if(!next_tab) return
                        const dirConfig = this.isCloserToLeftOrRight(next_tab, $(this).find(".jky-tabs-scroll")[0])
                        const isIn = this.isElementInsideParent(next_tab, $(this).find(".jky-tabs-scroll")[0])

                        setTimeout(() => {
                            const index = $(next_tab).index()
                            if(index === this.querySelectorAll(".jky-tabs-item").length - 1) {
                                this.selectors.next.classList.add("unvisible")
                                this.selectors.prev.classList.remove("unvisible")
                            }

                            if(index === 0) {
                                this.selectors.prev.classList.add("unvisible")
                                this.selectors.next.classList.remove("unvisible")
                            }

                            $(this).find(".jky-tabs-item").removeClass("curr_tab")
                            next_tab.classList.add("curr_tab")
                        }, 120);
                        if(isIn) return
                        $(this).find(".jky-tabs-scroll-inner").css("scroll-behavior", "smooth")
                        setTimeout(() => {
                            $(this).find(".jky-tabs-scroll-inner").css("scroll-behavior", "unset")
                        }, 200);

                        // 目标tab超出可视容器范围
                        if(dirConfig.dir === 1) { // 右边界
                            this.selectors.container.scrollLeft = this.selectors.container.scrollLeft - dirConfig.value + 60
                        } else {
                            requestAnimationFrame(() => {
                                this.selectors.container.scrollLeft = this.selectors.container.scrollLeft + dirConfig.value
                            })
                        }
                    })

                    this.selectors.prev_btn.addEventListener("click", () => {
                        const active_tab = this.querySelector(".jky-tabs-item.curr_tab")
                        const prev_tab = $(active_tab).prev(".jky-tabs-item")[0]
                        if(!prev_tab) return

                        const dirConfig = this.isCloserToLeftOrRight(prev_tab, $(this).find(".jky-tabs-scroll")[0])
                        const isIn = this.isElementInsideParent(prev_tab, $(this).find(".jky-tabs-scroll")[0])

                        setTimeout(() => {
                            const index = $(prev_tab).index()
                            if(index === this.querySelectorAll(".jky-tabs-item").length - 1) {
                                this.selectors.next.classList.add("unvisible")
                                this.selectors.prev.classList.remove("unvisible")
                            }
                            if(index === 0) {
                                this.selectors.prev.classList.add("unvisible")
                                this.selectors.next.classList.remove("unvisible")
                            }

                            $(this).find(".jky-tabs-item").removeClass("curr_tab")
                            prev_tab.classList.add("curr_tab")
                        }, 120);
                        if(isIn) return
                        $(this).find(".jky-tabs-scroll-inner").css("scroll-behavior", "smooth")
                        setTimeout(() => {
                            $(this).find(".jky-tabs-scroll-inner").css("scroll-behavior", "unset")
                        }, 200);
                        // 目标tab超出可视容器范围
                        if(dirConfig.dir === 1) { // 右边界
                            this.selectors.container.scrollLeft = this.selectors.container.scrollLeft - dirConfig.value
                        } else {
                            this.selectors.container.scrollLeft = this.selectors.container.scrollLeft + dirConfig.value - 60
                        }
                    })

                    if(this.isProdctTab) {
                        setTimeout(() => {
                            this.handleHash()
                        }, 200)
                    }
                }

                slideToVisiable(next_tab) {
                    const dirConfig = this.isCloserToLeftOrRight(next_tab, $(this).find(".jky-tabs-scroll")[0])
                    const isIn = this.isElementInsideParent(next_tab, $(this).find(".jky-tabs-scroll")[0])

                    // 目标tab超出可视容器范围
                    if(isIn) return

                    $(this).find(".jky-tabs-scroll-inner").css("scroll-behavior", "smooth")
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        $(this).find(".jky-tabs-scroll-inner").css("scroll-behavior", "unset")
                    }, 200);
                    if (dirConfig.dir === 1) { // 右边界
                        this.selectors.container.scrollLeft = this.selectors.container
                            .scrollLeft - dirConfig.value
                    } else {
                        requestAnimationFrame(() => {
                            this.selectors.container.scrollLeft = this.selectors
                                .container.scrollLeft + dirConfig.value
                        })
                    }
                }

                setTabsUnderline() {
                    const tabs_under = $(this).find(".jky-tabs-slideline .jky-tabs-slideline--inner")
                    const active_tab = $(this).find(".jky-tabs-item.active")
                    if (!tabs_under.length || !active_tab.length) return

                    tabs_under.width(`${active_tab.width()}px`)
                    tabs_under.css("left", `${active_tab.position().left}px`)
                }

                isCloserToLeftOrRight(element, parentElement) { // 判断元素靠近左边界还是右边界
                    var elementRect = element.getBoundingClientRect();
                    var parentRect = parentElement.getBoundingClientRect();

                    if (elementRect.x - parentRect.x < 0) {
                        return {
                            dir: -1,
                            value: elementRect.x - parentRect.x
                        }
                    } else {
                        return {
                            dir: 1,
                            value: parentRect.right - elementRect.right
                        }
                    }
                }
                isElementInsideParent(element, parentElement) { // 判断元素是否在内部
                    var elementRect = element.getBoundingClientRect();
                    var parentRect = parentElement.getBoundingClientRect();

                    var isInside = (
                        elementRect.left >= parentRect.left &&
                        elementRect.top >= parentRect.top &&
                        elementRect.right <= parentRect.right &&
                        elementRect.bottom <= parentRect.bottom
                    );
                    return isInside;
                }
                move() {
                    let doc = this;
                    let html = this.selectors.container;
                    let content = this.selectors.container;
                    doc.startime = 0
                    doc.endtime = 0
                    // 禁止选中文字
                    doc.onselectstart = function () { return false; };

                    let startScroll = 0;
                    let startX = 0;
                    let previousX = 0; // 保存上一次的clientX坐标
                    let currentX = 0; // 获取每次移动的位置
                    let velocity = 0; // 控制速度
                    let direction = 0; // 控制左右滑动
                    let momentum = 0.875; // 控制滑动距离
                    let momentumInterval = null;
                    let velocityInterval = null;

                    /**
                        * 鼠标移动事件
                        **/
                    function f(event) {
                        // 获取每次移动的位置
                        currentX = doc.isMobile ? event.touches[0].clientX : event.clientX;
                        html.scrollLeft = startScroll + (startX - currentX);

                        if(html.scrollWidth <= html.scrollLeft + html.clientWidth  && html.scrollLeft > 0) { // 滚动到最右边
                            doc.selectors.next.classList.add("unvisible")
                            doc.selectors.prev.classList.remove("unvisible")
                        }

                        if(html.scrollLeft <= 0) { // 滚动到最左边
                            doc.selectors.prev.classList.add("unvisible")
                            doc.selectors.next.classList.remove("unvisible")
                        }
                    }

                    /**
                        * 鼠标离开.content
                        **/
                    content.onmouseleave = function () {
                        /**
                            * 移除.content的鼠标移动事件
                            * @see f
                            **/
                        content.removeEventListener(doc.onmousemove_event, f);

                    };

                    /**
                        * 鼠标点击事件
                        **/
                    content[doc.onmousedown_event] = function (event) {
                        doc.startime = event.timeStamp

                        startScroll = html.scrollLeft;
                        startX = doc.isMobile ? event.touches[0].clientX : event.clientX;

                        previousX = startX;
                        currentX = startX;
                        clearInterval(velocityInterval);
                        velocityInterval = setInterval(function () {
                            // previousX保存上一次移动鼠标的clientX值
                            // 慢速移动时currentX与previousX数值相同或者差值较小（慢速移动鼠标一直在一个点上）
                            // 快速滑动时鼠标左滑previousX大于currentX，右滑currentX大于previousX
                            // 原理：当快速移动时，松开鼠标的时候已经不在当时点击的点位上，50毫秒后就出现了2个变量的数值差
                            // 原因：鼠标移动时，不会存储所有的移动信息。尤其是在快速移动鼠标时
                            velocity = Math.abs(currentX - previousX);

                            // 正负数转换用于控制左右滑动
                            // 左滑动为正数，右滑动为负数
                            direction = currentX > previousX ? -1 : 1;

                            previousX = currentX;
                        }, 50);

                        /**
                            * .content添加鼠标移动事件
                            * @see f
                            **/
                        this.addEventListener(doc.onmousemove_event, f);
                    };

                    /**
                        * 松开鼠标事件
                        **/
                    content[doc.onmouseup_event] = function (event) {
                        let num = 0;
                        clearInterval(velocityInterval);
                        clearInterval(momentumInterval);
                        num = velocity;
                        // 鼠标松开后开始执行滑动
                        momentumInterval = setInterval(function () {
                            // 滑动距离
                            // 滑动距离依次减小
                            html.scrollLeft = html.scrollLeft + num * direction;

                            // 数值依次减小
                            num *= momentum;

                            // 小于1销毁定时器，滑动结束
                            if (Math.abs(num) < 1) {
                                clearInterval(momentumInterval);
                            }
                        }, 15);

                        /**
                            * 移除.content的鼠标移动事件
                            * @see f
                            **/
                        content.removeEventListener(doc.onmousemove_event, f);
                        doc.endtime = event.timeStamp
                    };
                }

                handleHash() {
                    if(!this.isProdctTab) return
                    const hash = location.hash.replace("#", "");
                    let target = ''
                    if(!location.hash || hash.indexOf("product_tab_") === -1) {
                        target = null
                    } else {
                        target = hash
                    }
                    target && $(this).find(`.jky-tabs-item[data-cate=${target}]`).trigger('click');
                }
            })
        }

        // 深色浅色块交叉
        function getPro(element) {
            const style = window.getComputedStyle(element);
            const index = Number(style.getPropertyValue('--translate-active')) || 0;
            return index
        }
        function invertNavigation() {
            const nav = document.querySelector(".product-tabs-box");

            function didChangeViewport() {
                const ele = document.querySelector(".inner--container")
                if (!ele) return

                const index = getPro(ele)
                const doc = $(".produc-detail--contetn_item").eq(index)[0]
                const elements = Array.from(doc.querySelectorAll(".product-block-section"));
                const isMobile = window.innerWidth < 1024;

                const slide = elements.find((element) => {
                    const MARGIN = isMobile ? 45.0 : 65.0;
                    const {
                        top,
                        bottom
                    } = element.getBoundingClientRect();
                    return top < MARGIN && bottom > MARGIN;
                });

                if(type_column) {
                    const innerDom = document.querySelector(".inner--container_column")
                    if(!innerDom) return
                    const contents = Array.from(innerDom.querySelectorAll(".produc-detail--contetn_item"));
                    const curr_content = contents.find((element) => {
                        const MARGIN = isMobile ? 25.0 : 65.0;
                        const {
                            top,
                            bottom
                        } = element.getBoundingClientRect();
                        return top < MARGIN && bottom > MARGIN;
                    });

                    if(curr_content) {
                        try {
                            const index = $(curr_content).index()
                            $(".subnav-list .navli").removeClass("active")
                            $(".subnav-list .navli")[index].classList.add("active")
                            !tabs_is_mobile && setTabsUnderline()

                            const product_tabs = document.querySelector(".product-tabs-container jky-tabs")
                            if(product_tabs && tabs_is_mobile) {
                                $(product_tabs).find(".jky-tabs-item").removeClass("curr_tab")
                                $(product_tabs).find(".jky-tabs-item").removeClass("active")

                                $(product_tabs).find(".jky-tabs-item")[index].classList.add("active", "curr_tab")
                                product_tabs?.setTabsUnderline()
                            }
                        } catch(e) {
                            $(".subnav-list .navli").removeClass("active")
                            !tabs_is_mobile && setTabsUnderline()
                        }
                    }
                }

                if (slide) {
                    if (isMobile && slide.dataset.invertMobile) {
                        const shouldInvertMobile = slide.dataset.invertMobile === "true";
                        nav.classList.toggle("inverted", shouldInvertMobile);
                    } else {
                        if(slide.dataset.invert) {
                            nav.classList.add("inverted")
                        } else {
                            nav.classList.remove("inverted")
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    nav.classList.remove("inverted")
                }
            }

            window.addEventListener("scroll", didChangeViewport, { passive: true });
            didChangeViewport();

            return function destroyInvertNavigation() {
                window.removeEventListener("scroll", didChangeViewport);
            };
        };
        setTimeout(() => invertNavigation(), 200)
        // 深色浅色块交叉
    })
</script>

<style>
    .title-snippet.title-snippet-small {
        padding: 88px 0 80px;
    }

    .title-snippet.title-snippet-big {
        padding: 136px 0 128px;
    }

    .title-snippet.title-snippet-middle {
        padding: 112px 0 104px;
    }

    .title-snippet.title-snippet-custom {
        padding-top: var(--pc-padding-top);
        padding-bottom: var(--pc-padding-bottom);
    }

    .title-snippet .title-container {
        margin: 0 auto;
        width: fit-content;
        text-align: center;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        position: relative;
    }

    .title-snippet .title-container .text {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 48px;
        line-height: 58px;
        max-width: 1000px;
        color: #1a1a1a;
        width: auto;
        height: auto;
        letter-spacing: -1px;
    }

    .title-snippet .title-container .overlay {
        position: absolute;
        left: 0;
        right: 0;
        top: 0;
        bottom: 0;
        z-index: 1;
    }

    .title-snippet .title-container .overlay .box {
        position: absolute;
        transition: all .6s cubic-bezier(.8, 0, .2, 1);
        pointer-events: none;
        background-color: #fff;
    }


    .title-snippet .title-container .overlay .top,
    .title-snippet .title-container .overlay .bottom {
        left: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 50%;
    }

    .title-snippet .title-container .overlay .top {
        top: 0;
    }

    .title-snippet .title-container .overlay .bottom {
        bottom: 0;
    }

    .title-snippet .title-container .overlay .left,
    .title-snippet .title-container .overlay .right {
        top: 50%;
        width: 50%;
        height: 100%;
        transform: translateY(-50%);
    }

    .title-snippet .title-container .overlay .left {
        left: 0;
    }

    .title-snippet .title-container .overlay .right {
        right: 0;
    }

    .title-snippet .title-container .overlay .top-left,
    .title-snippet .title-container .overlay .bottom-right {
        position: absolute;
        z-index: 2;
    }

    .title-snippet .title-container .overlay .top-left {
        width: 38px;
        top: calc(50% - 46px);
        left: calc(50% - 52px);
        transition: all .6s cubic-bezier(.8, 0, .2, 1);
    }

    .title-snippet .title-container .overlay .bottom-right {
        width: 50px;
        bottom: calc(50% - 46px);
        right: calc(50% - 50px);
        transition: all .6s cubic-bezier(.8, 0, .2, 1);
    }

    .title-snippet .title-container .overlay .kong {
        position: absolute;
        left: 50%;
        top: 50%;
        translate: -50% -50%;
        width: 0;
        height: 0;
        background-color: transparent;
        transition: all 3s cubic-bezier(.8, 0, .2, 1);
        pointer-events: none;
    }

    .title-snippet.title-snippet-show .title-container .overlay .top,
    .title-snippet.title-snippet-show .title-container .overlay .bottom {
        height: 0;
    }

    .title-snippet.title-snippet-show .title-container .overlay .left,
    .title-snippet.title-snippet-show .title-container .overlay .right {

<script>
    window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
      // 渐变出现
      const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
          entries.forEach((entry) => {
              if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                  // 元素进入视窗,触发动画
                  entry.target.classList.add('title-snippet-show');
              } else {
                  entry.target.classList.remove('title-snippet-show');
              }
          });
      });

      // 开始观察目标元素
      const newTitles = document.querySelectorAll('.title-snippet')
      if (newTitles && newTitles.length) {
        newTitles.forEach(item => {
              observer.observe(item);
          })
      }
  })

  </script>

<script>
    window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
      // 渐变出现
      const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
          entries.forEach((entry) => {
              if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                  // 元素进入视窗,触发动画
                  entry.target.classList.add('title-snippet-show');
              } else {
                  entry.target.classList.remove('title-snippet-show');
              }
          });
      });

      // 开始观察目标元素
      const newTitles = document.querySelectorAll('.title-snippet')
      if (newTitles && newTitles.length) {
        newTitles.forEach(item => {
              observer.observe(item);
          })
      }
  })

  </script>

    window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {

          });
      });

      // 开始观察目标元素
      const newTitles = document.querySelectorAll('.title-snippet')
      if (newTitles && newTitles.length) {
        newTitles.forEach(item => {
              observer.observe(item);
          })
      }
  })

          <h2 class="faq-title">FAQ</h2>

            <div class="produc-detail--faq-wrap flex">
              
<div class="produc-detail--faq-left"><div
                      class="faq-category-name active"

                      data-index="0"
                      data-view-more-link=""
                    >About Explorer 2000 v2</div></div><div class="produc-detail--faq-right">
                
<ul data-index="0" class="active">
                      
<li>
                          <div class="faq-header flex">
                            <h3 class="item-title">How to turn on the Energy Saving Mode?</h3>
                            <svg class="toggle_btn active" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" p-id="2530" width="36" height="36"><path d="M512 671.288889L785.066667 398.222222l-56.888889-62.577778L512 551.822222 295.822222 335.644444 233.244444 398.222222z" fill="currentColor" opacity=".6" p-id="2531"></path></svg>
                          </div>
                          <div class="faq-content">
                            <div class="rte"><div class="metafield-rich_text_field"><p>Long press the AC Button and Main Power Button until the Energy Saving Mode icon lights up on the screen</p></div></div>
                            <div></div>
                          </div>
                        </li><li>
                          <div class="faq-header flex">
                            <h3 class="item-title">How long is the Warranty of this device?</h3>
                            <svg class="toggle_btn active" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" p-id="2530" width="36" height="36"><path d="M512 671.288889L785.066667 398.222222l-56.888889-62.577778L512 551.822222 295.822222 335.644444 233.244444 398.222222z" fill="currentColor" opacity=".6" p-id="2531"></path></svg>
                          </div>
                          <div class="faq-content">
                            <div class="rte"><div class="metafield-rich_text_field"><p>Jackery provides 3 years standard warranty and 2 years extended warranty. Please note that we only provide our warranty to customers who purchase from the official Jackery website, Jackery-branded third-party platforms, or authorized dealers.</p></div></div>
                            <div></div>
                          </div>
                        </li><li>
                          <div class="faq-header flex">
                            <h3 class="item-title">Can I use the Jackery while it's charging?</h3>
                            <svg class="toggle_btn active" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" p-id="2530" width="36" height="36"><path d="M512 671.288889L785.066667 398.222222l-56.888889-62.577778L512 551.822222 295.822222 335.644444 233.244444 398.222222z" fill="currentColor" opacity=".6" p-id="2531"></path></svg>
                          </div>
                          <div class="faq-content">
                            <div class="rte"><div class="metafield-rich_text_field"><p>Yes, you can use Jackery power stations while they're charging! This feature is called pass-through charging. It allows you to power your devices while simultaneously recharging the Jackery unit. This is especially useful during longer power outages or extended outdoor trips</p></div></div>
                            <div></div>
                          </div>
                        </li><li>
                          <div class="faq-header flex">
                            <h3 class="item-title">Can I charge the Explorer 2000v2 in my car?</h3>
                            <svg class="toggle_btn active" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" p-id="2530" width="36" height="36"><path d="M512 671.288889L785.066667 398.222222l-56.888889-62.577778L512 551.822222 295.822222 335.644444 233.244444 398.222222z" fill="currentColor" opacity=".6" p-id="2531"></path></svg>
                          </div>
                          <div class="faq-content">
                            <div class="rte"><div class="metafield-rich_text_field"><p>Yes, you can charge the Explorer 2000 v2 using a 12V car charging cable.<br />
<br />
</p></div></div>
                            <div></div>
                          </div>
                        </li><li>
                          <div class="faq-header flex">
                            <h3 class="item-title">Is the Explorer 2000 v2 expandable?</h3>
                            <svg class="toggle_btn active" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" p-id="2530" width="36" height="36"><path d="M512 671.288889L785.066667 398.222222l-56.888889-62.577778L512 551.822222 295.822222 335.644444 233.244444 398.222222z" fill="currentColor" opacity=".6" p-id="2531"></path></svg>
                          </div>
                          <div class="faq-content">
                            <div class="rte"><div class="metafield-rich_text_field"><p>No, the Explorer 2000 v2 is not expandable. If you need an expandable option, consider the Solar Generator 2000 Plus, which offers expandable battery options.</p></div></div>
                            <div></div>
                          </div>
                        </li><li>
                          <div class="faq-header flex">
                            <h3 class="item-title">How to Charge the device via AC Wall Outlet?</h3>
                            <svg class="toggle_btn active" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" p-id="2530" width="36" height="36"><path d="M512 671.288889L785.066667 398.222222l-56.888889-62.577778L512 551.822222 295.822222 335.644444 233.244444 398.222222z" fill="currentColor" opacity=".6" p-id="2531"></path></svg>
                          </div>
                          <div class="faq-content">
                            <div class="rte"><div class="metafield-rich_text_field"><p>Connect the AC charging cable to the input port of the power station and plug it into the wall outlet.</p></div></div>
                            <div></div>
                          </div>
                        </li><li>
                          <div class="faq-header flex">
                            <h3 class="item-title">How to turn on the Energy Saving Mode?</h3>
                            <svg class="toggle_btn active" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" p-id="2530" width="36" height="36"><path d="M512 671.288889L785.066667 398.222222l-56.888889-62.577778L512 551.822222 295.822222 335.644444 233.244444 398.222222z" fill="currentColor" opacity=".6" p-id="2531"></path></svg>
                          </div>
                          <div class="faq-content">
                            <div class="rte"><div class="metafield-rich_text_field"><p>Long press the AC Button and Main Power Button until the Energy Saving Mode icon lights up on the screen</p></div></div>
                            <div></div>
                          </div>
                        </li><li>
                          <div class="faq-header flex">
                            <h3 class="item-title">What is emergency charging mode?</h3>
                            <svg class="toggle_btn active" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" p-id="2530" width="36" height="36"><path d="M512 671.288889L785.066667 398.222222l-56.888889-62.577778L512 551.822222 295.822222 335.644444 233.244444 398.222222z" fill="currentColor" opacity=".6" p-id="2531"></path></svg>
                          </div>
                          <div class="faq-content">
                            <div class="rte"><div class="metafield-rich_text_field"><p>Under this mode, you can rapidly power up the portable power station using the AC charging method. This emergency charge function can be activated or deactivated through the Jackery app. When in emergency charging mode, the circular light indicating the state of charge (SOC) will blink at an increased pace</p></div></div>
                            <div></div>
                          </div>
                        </li><li>
                          <div class="faq-header flex">
                            <h3 class="item-title">How long is the Warranty of this device?</h3>
                            <svg class="toggle_btn active" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" p-id="2530" width="36" height="36"><path d="M512 671.288889L785.066667 398.222222l-56.888889-62.577778L512 551.822222 295.822222 335.644444 233.244444 398.222222z" fill="currentColor" opacity=".6" p-id="2531"></path></svg>
                          </div>
                          <div class="faq-content">
                            <div class="rte"><div class="metafield-rich_text_field"><p>Jackery provides 3 years standard warranty and 2 years extended warranty. Please note that we only provide our warranty to customers who purchase from the ocial Jackery website, Jackery-branded third-party platforms, or local authorized dealers.<br />
<br />
</p></div></div>
                            <div></div>
                          </div>
                        </li><li>
                          <div class="faq-header flex">
                            <h3 class="item-title">What is the recommanded temperature of this product?</h3>
                            <svg class="toggle_btn active" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" p-id="2530" width="36" height="36"><path d="M512 671.288889L785.066667 398.222222l-56.888889-62.577778L512 551.822222 295.822222 335.644444 233.244444 398.222222z" fill="currentColor" opacity=".6" p-id="2531"></path></svg>
                          </div>
                          <div class="faq-content">
                            <div class="rte"><div class="metafield-rich_text_field"><p>The recommended charging temperature for the product is between 0°C to 45°C (32°F to 113°F), and the discharging temperature is between -10°C to 45°C (14°F to 113°F). Operating the product outside this temperature range may restrict its charging and discharging capabilities, or even render it unable to charge or discharge.</p></div></div>
                            <div></div>
                          </div>
                        </li></ul></div>

<script defer>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
    const galleryElements = document.querySelectorAll(".pswp-gallery-faq a");
    const images = document.querySelectorAll(".pswp-gallery-faq a img");
    let domWidth = document.body.scrollWidth;
    const fullImage = document.getElementById("fullImage");
    if (domWidth < 1024) {
      images.forEach(image => {
        image.addEventListener("click", function () {
          fullImage.src = image.src;
          if (window.matchMedia && window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)').matches) {
              overlay.style.background = "rgb(0, 0, 0)"
          }
          overlay.style.display = "flex";
        });
      });

      // 点击背景关闭
      overlay.addEventListener("click", function () {
        overlay.style.display = "none";
      });

    } else {

      galleryElements.forEach((element, index) => {

        element.addEventListener("click", (event) => {
          event.preventDefault();

          const galleryItems = Array.from(galleryElements).map((el) => {
            const img = el.querySelector("img"); // 获取 <a> 内的 <img>
            return {
              src: img ? img.getAttribute("src") : el.getAttribute("href"), // 如果有 <img>，使用 <img> 的 src，否则用 <a> 的 href

            };
          });

  <script defer>

    $(function () {
      
      
      
        function calcActualLines() {
          const subtitle = document.querySelector(`#template--16913618763863__pdp_text_img_carousel_BnFTTD .info-box .subtitle`)
          if(!subtitle) return
          const infoBoxHeaderHeight = $(`#template--16913618763863__pdp_text_img_carousel_BnFTTD .info-box-header`).height() || 0
          const titleHeight = $(`#template--16913618763863__pdp_text_img_carousel_BnFTTD .info-box .title`).outerHeight() +  parseInt($(`#template--16913618763863__pdp_text_img_carousel_BnFTTD .info-box .title`).css('margin-bottom')) || 0
          const noteHeight =  $(`#template--16913618763863__pdp_text_img_carousel_BnFTTD .info-box-header .note`).outerHeight() +  parseInt($(`#template--16913618763863__pdp_text_img_carousel_BnFTTD .info-box-header .note`).css('margin-bottom')) || 0
          const computedStyle = window.getComputedStyle(subtitle);
          const lineHeight = parseFloat(computedStyle.lineHeight);
          const subtitlerHeight = infoBoxHeaderHeight - titleHeight - noteHeight;

          // 计算最大行数
          const maxLines = Math.floor(subtitlerHeight / lineHeight);
         // 计算实际行数
         const textLines = Math.floor(subtitle.scrollHeight / lineHeight);
         if(textLines > maxLines) {
            $('#template--16913618763863__pdp_text_img_carousel_BnFTTD .subtitle').css({
              'display': '-webkit-box',
              'overflow': 'hidden',
              'webkitBoxOrient': 'vertical',
              'text-overflow': 'ellipsis',
              'webkitLineClamp':`${maxLines}` ,
            })
          }
        }

        if (document.body.clientWidth >= 1024) {
          calcActualLines()
        }

      
});
  </script>

        top: 50%;

        transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(0);
        border-radius: 9999px;
        background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);

        content: '';
        width: 10.666666666666666vw;
        height: 10.666666666666666vw;

    #fixed-icons .go-back-icon::after {

        top: 50%;

        transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
        background-size: 19px 12px;
        background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);

        content: '';

      const button_name =$('.footer-new .newbee-form_submit button').text()

          event: "ga4Event",
          event_name: "footer_user_clicks4.0",
          event_parameters: {
