<jky-form data-scroll="true" data-is-in-dialog="true" data-no-reset-after-submit="true"  data-reset-radio="true"
   jky-form-id="purchase-intention-form" class="purchase-intention-form">
  <form data-action="/osconsumerapi/consumer/act/record-information">
    <div class="form-item form-desc jds-b1">
      Our experts will help you find the best home power solution and answer your questions. Just fill out the form —
      we’ll be in touch.
    </div>
    <div class="hidden">
      <div class="form-item form-item_const" data-field="input">
        <input type="hidden" name="cr" data-value="cr" value="US">
      </div>
      <div class="form-item form-item_const" data-field="input">
        <input type="hidden" name="pageUrl" class="page-url" data-value="pageUrl" value="">
      </div>
    </div>
    <section class="top-border">
      <div class="section-title jds-h6 bottom-20">Contact Information</div>
      <div class="form-row flex">
        <div class="form-item flex-col w-half required" data-field="input">
          <label> Full Name (required) <span class="red">*</span> </label>
          <input
            type="text"
            id="fullName"
            name="fullName"
            placeholder="Your answer"
            data-error="This is a required question."
            data-value="fullName"
          >
        </div>
        <div class="form-item flex-col w-half required" data-field="input">
          <label> Phone Number (required) <span class="red">*</span> </label>
          <input
            type="number"
            id="phoneNumber"
            name="phoneNumber"
            placeholder="Your answer"
            data-error="This is a required question."
            data-value="phoneNumber"
          >
        </div>
        <div class="form-item flex-col w-half required" data-field="input">
          <label> Email Address (required) <span class="red">*</span> </label>
          <input
            type="email"
            id="email"
            name="email"
            placeholder="Your answer"
            data-error="This is a required question."
            data-value="email"
            data-reg="email"
            data-regerror="Email is invalid"
          >
        </div>
      </div>
    </section>

    <section class="top-border">
      <div class="section-title jds-h6 bottom-16">Installation Address</div>
      <div class="section-desc jds-b1 bottom-20">We will only use this to check service availability in your area.</div>
      <div class="form-row flex">
        <div class="form-item flex-col w-half required" data-field="input">
          <label> Zip Code (required) <span class="red">*</span> </label>
          <input
            type="text"
            id="zipCode"
            name="zipCode"
            placeholder="Your answer"
            data-error="This is a required question."
            data-value="zipCode"
          >
        </div>

        <div class="form-item flex-col w-half required" data-field="input">
          <label> City (required) <span class="red">*</span> </label>
          <input
            type="text"
            id="city"
            name="city"
            placeholder="Your answer"
            data-error="This is a required question."
            data-value="city"
          >
        </div>
        <div class="form-item flex-col w-half required" data-field="input">
          <label> State (required) <span class="red">*</span> </label>
          <input
            type="text"
            id="state"
            name="state"
            placeholder="Your answer"
            data-error="This is a required question."
            data-value="state"
          >
        </div>
        <div class="form-item flex-col w-half" data-field="input">
          <label> Street Address (optional)</label>
          <input
            type="text"
            id="address"
            name="address"
            placeholder="Your answer"
            data-value="address"
          >
        </div>
      </div>
    </section>

    <section class="top-border">
      <div class="section-title jds-h6 bottom-16">Backup Power Preference <span class="red">*</span></div>
      <div class="section-desc jds-b1 bottom-20">
        This helps us understand your power needs and recommend the right solution.
      </div>
      <div class="form-row flex">
        <div class="form-item flex-col w-full required" data-field="radio" data-value="preference" data-error="This is a required question.">
          <label class="radio-label">
            <input
              type="radio"
              name="preference"
              placeholder="Your answer"
              value="Whole-home backup"

            >
            Whole-home backup
          </label>
          <label class="radio-label">
            <input
              type="radio"
              name="preference"
              placeholder="Your answer"
              value="Essentials only (e.g., fridge, lights, Wi-Fi)"
            >
            Essentials only (e.g., fridge, lights, Wi-Fi)
          </label>

<script defer>
    window.$(document).ready(function(){
        const distance = 600

        $(window).scroll(function () {
            if ($(this).scrollTop() > distance) {
                $('#back-top').fadeIn();
                $('#back-top').css('opacity', 1)
            } else {
                $('#back-top').fadeOut();
            }
        });

        // 滚动到顶部
        window.Jackery.goBackTopStatus = false; // 全局返回顶部状态位
        if (document.querySelector('#back-top')) {
            document.querySelector('#back-top').onclick = () => {
                window.Jackery.goBackTopStatus = true;
                $('html,body').animate({
                    scrollTop: 0
                }, 500, function () {
                    window.Jackery.goBackTopStatus = false;
                });
                return false
            }
        }
    })
</script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
  (function(){
    var deviceType = /iPad/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? "t" : /Mobile|iP(hone|od)|Android|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Silk/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? "m" : "d";
    window.criteo_q = window.criteo_q || [];
    window.criteo_q.push(
      { event: "setAccount", account: 104329 },
      
        { event: "setEmail", email: "", hash_method: "none"},
      
      { event: "setSiteType", type: deviceType },
      { event: "setZipcode", zipcode: "" },
        
        
        
        
          { event: "viewItem", ecpplugin: "shopify-cg", item:  "7294415503447"  }
          
        
        
    );
    window.addEventListener('load', function() {
      // ajax request catching
      (function(open) {
        XMLHttpRequest.prototype.open = function(method, url, async, user, pass) {
          this.addEventListener("readystatechange", function() {
            if (this.readyState == 4 && this._url.includes("/add.js") && "7294415503447" != "") {
              try {
                $.getJSON("/cart.js", function(data) {
                  var basketData = [];
                  var item;
                  if (!data.items || !data.items.length) return;
                  for (var i = 0; i < data.items.length; i++) {
                    item = data.items[i];
                    if (item.product_id == "7294415503447") {
                      basketData.push({
                        id: item.product_id,
                        price: (typeof(item.price) != "number") ? item.price : (item.price/100),
                        quantity: item.quantity
                      });
                    }
                  }
                  window.criteo_q.push({
                    event: "addToCart",
                    ecpplugin: "shopify-cg",
                    product: basketData 
                  });
                });
              } catch (err) {
                // do nothing
              }
            }
          }, false);
          open.apply(this, arguments);
        };
      })(XMLHttpRequest.prototype.open);

      // fetch request catching
      const crtoMock = window.fetch;
      window.fetch = function() {
        return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
          crtoMock.apply(this, arguments)
            .then((response) => {
              if(response.url.includes("/add.js") && response.type != "cors" && "7294415503447" != ""){
                try {
                  $.getJSON("/cart.js", function(data) {
                    var basketData = [];
                    var item;
                    if (!data.items || !data.items.length) return;
                    for (var i = 0; i < data.items.length; i++) {
                      item = data.items[i];
                      if (item.product_id == "7294415503447") {
                        basketData.push({
                          id: item.product_id,
                          price: (typeof(item.price) != "number") ? item.price : (item.price/100),
                          quantity: item.quantity
                        });
                      }
                    }
                    window.criteo_q.push({
                      event: "addToCart",
                      ecpplugin: "shopify-cg",
                      product: basketData 
                    });
                  });
                } catch (err) {
                  // do nothing
                }
              }
              resolve(response);
            })
            .catch((error) => {
              reject(error);
            })
        });
      }
    }, false);
  })();
</script>

      <script>
      window.addEventListener('load', function() {
      var _learnq = window._learnq || [];
      function addedToCart() {
        fetch(`${window.location.origin}/cart.js`)
        .then(res => res.clone().json().then(data => {
          var cart = {
            total_price: data.total_price/100,
            $value: data.total_price/100,
            total_discount: data.total_discount,
            original_total_price: data.original_total_price/100,
            items: data.items
          }
          if (item !== 'undefined') {
            cart = Object.assign(cart, item)
          }
          if (klAjax) {
              _learnq.push(['track', 'Added to Cart', cart]);
              klAjax = false;
            }
        }))
      };
      (function (ns, fetch) {
        ns.fetch = function() {
          const response = fetch.apply(this, arguments);
          response.then(res => {
            if (`${window.location.origin}/cart/add.js`
              .includes(res.url)) {
                addedToCart()
            }
          });
          return response
        }
      }(window, window.fetch));
      var klAjax = true;
      var atcButtons = document.querySelectorAll("form[action*='/cart/add'] button[type='submit']");
      for (var i = 0; i < atcButtons.length; i++) {
          atcButtons[i].addEventListener("click", function() {
            if (klAjax) {
              _learnq.push(['track', 'Added to Cart', item]);
              klAjax = false;
            }
          })
      }
      });

    function throttle(func, limit) {
        let inThrottle;
        return function executedFunction(...args) {
            if (!inThrottle) {

                inThrottle = true;
                setTimeout(function() {
                    inThrottle = false;
                }, limit);
            }
        };

    async function handleUserInfoUpdate() {
        const userInfo = {
            oldCartToken: window.localStorage.getItem('ins-old-cart-token'),
            oldInsiderId: window.localStorage.getItem('ins-old-insider-id'),
            newInsiderId: Insider.getUserId(),
            newCartToken: await getCartToken(),
            insiderSessionId: Insider.getUserSession()

        const isInfoChanged = userInfo.oldCartToken !== userInfo.newCartToken ||
            userInfo.oldInsiderId !== userInfo.newInsiderId

        }

        if (isInfoChanged) {
            sendUserInfoRequest(userInfo);
        }
    }

    function sendUserInfoRequest(userInfo) {
        let url =

            '&oldCt=' + (userInfo.oldCartToken || '');

        let request = new XMLHttpRequest();
        request.onload = function() {
            if (this.status >= 200 && this.status < 300) {
                setUserInfos(userInfo);
            }
        };
        request.open('GET', url, true);
        request.send();
    }

    function setUserInfos(userInfo) {
        window.localStorage.setItem('ins-old-cart-token', userInfo.newCartToken);
        window.localStorage.setItem('ins-old-insider-id', userInfo.newInsiderId);
    }

    async function getCartToken() {
        const response = await fetch(window.Shopify.routes.root + 'cart.js');
        const data = await response.json();

        return data.item_count > 0 ? data.token : null;
    }

    window.addEventListener('insider:api-initialized', throttle(handleUserInfoUpdate, 2000));
    window.addEventListener('cart:amount:update', throttle(handleUserInfoUpdate, 2000));
</script>
<!-- END app snippet -->
